message.summary: Starting migration of TangoTiempo from calendar-be to calendar-be-af
details: Created branches: migrate-tt-to-functions in both TT and calendar-be-af
Created MIGRATION_PLAN.md and MIGRATION_LOG.md in TT repo
Found 49 files with API calls to migrate
AF functions already exist for most endpoints
Will create central apiUrlResolver.js for clean switching
migration_order: Phase 1: GET endpoints (categories, roles, health, venues, organizers, events)
message.your_role: Review FE changes after each endpoint migration
